content: Hi, I'm new to the HAPI FHIR, and I'd like to create JPA App that exposes some subset of the FHIR obiects (e.g. Observations & Patients), and keep everything else not available (also in terms on unnecessary db tables, swagger interface etc.). How can I achieve that ? As a reference project I'm using https://github.com/hapifhir/hapi-fhir-jpaserver-starter.
It might be best to ask on #hapi

@Marek Gocał you can control which resources and what methods that are exposed by looking at the ResourceProviders that are constructed as beans. Look at e.g. https://hapifhir.io/hapi-fhir/apidocs/hapi-fhir-jpaserver-base/src-html/ca/uhn/fhir/jpa/config/BaseJavaConfigR4.html
